  • Welcome to the Essex Network of Artists' Studios (ENAS). Search for artists, join or register a studio and access creative and professional development opportunities.

Featured Studios

Cuckoo Farm Studios
Cuckoo Farm Studios is an artist run organisation formed in 1992, in converted farm buildings on the northern outskirts of the historical town of Colchester. Cuckoo Farm Studios is more than a provider of studio space for artists. It is a...
Slack Space
Slack Space Colchester is a not-for-profit volunteer run initiative that successfully transforms empty shops and buildings into community art spaces, where local artists can work, present new & exciting art to the general public as...
High House
Purpose-designed three-storey studio building comprising 39 self-contained studios and four work/live units. Ground floor contains seven large multi-purpose spaces for large-scale making, with the two upper floors containing 32 studio...
Peter Jones
Featured Artist

Peter Jones

Peter has a multi-disciplinary practice working across art, design, craft and education. Ceramics is a main focus for Peter, and is explored through object, film and performance.
